entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain mixed with light snow early this morning. Snow over higher terrain late this morning and early this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
